about_the_game:
Shadow Falls is an emotionally charged horror game where a grieving mother ventures into a forest to scatter her son's ashes, only to be drawn to an isolated farmhouse where strange things start to unfold. As she uncovers the secrets of the house and the forest, she discovers that death might not be the end and is faced with a harrowing choice that requires the ultimate sacrifice. Her journey explores the depths of a mother's unconditional love and the lengths she will go to for her child, all while battling malevolent entities determined to preserve the natural order and prevent her from reuniting with her son.

The story unfolds in stunning environments, leveraging the power of Unreal Engine 5 to provide an immersive experience, deepening the ability to take you on an unforgettable journey of discovery and mystery.



  • Enthralling Exploration: Traverse the breathtaking landscapes of Shadow Falls National Park, from the dense forest to the enigmatic old farmhouse and more.

  • Intriguing Puzzle Solving: Gather clues and unravel puzzles and riddles to advance your quest and uncover the secrets of Shadow Falls.

  • Lore Expansion: Collect notes that delve into the rich backstory of Shadow Falls and its enigmatic residents.

  • Artifact Gathering: Acquire a unique collection of artifacts essential for conducting the ultimate séance.

  • NPC Interactions: Engage with NPCs, encountering both allies and adversaries along your journey

content_descriptors.notes: Shadow falls may cover topics that some people may find destressing as it deals with life and death events.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7600K or better, AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or better, AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Installation on an SSD is recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-13700F or better, AMD Ryzen 7 7700 or better
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3080 or better, AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Installation on an SSD is recommended.

short_description: Shadow Falls is a first-person horror game, where you explore a mysterious farmhouse deep in the forest, solving eerie puzzles and uncovering secrets that reveal the thin veil between the world of the living and the dead. Delve deeper and uncover the sinister forces that led you here.
